actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into agreements with non-Federal agencies for the replacement of the existing American Falls Dam, Upper Snake River project, Idaho, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into agreements with non-Federal agencies for the replacement of the existing American Falls Dam, Upper Snake River project, Idaho. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into agreements with non-Federal agencies for the replacement of the existing American Falls Dam, Upper Snake River project, Idaho, and for other purposes.
